title: "Responsible Research Metrics Self-Study Module"
---

#### Welcome to this self-study module

This self-study module covers the core principles of responsible research metrics and can be completed in your own time.

This module is designed for:

-   Anyone who is interested in how research is measured and assessed;
-   Anyone involved in recruitment, reward and recognition processes or grant applications where research may be used as an assessment tool.

Everyone should complete Section 1, 2, and 3. Section 4 is for those who are involved in recruitment, reward and recognition processes, or grant applications as an assessor of people.

For help please contact the Library metrics team via eprints\@soton.ac.uk
